title: The Good Bad Dad Jokes Do
description:
Tom Schruben likes to tell jokes. Really bad dad jokes. And when he shared them with his friends and neighbors, he found that in times of trouble, a bad joke can do a whole lot of good.

See more of Tom’s bad dad jokes on Instagram or Facebook

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes
